Message: Flashy swing! Too bad it only bopped the nose.
Quick slash catches the cheek! Dimples are always nice.
Blade slashes across the face! Nice nose job.
Blow to head!
Quick flick of the wrist! The is slashed across its forehead!
Hard blow to the ear! Deep gash and a terrible headache!
Gruesome slash opens the forehead! Grey matter spills forth!
Wild upward slash remove the face from its skull! Interesting way to die.
Horrible slash to the head! Brain matter goes flying! Looks like it never felt a thing.
Gruesome, slashing blow to the side of the head! Skull split open! Brain (and life) vanishes in a fine mist.
Wicked slash slices open the [target]'s chest! Heart and lung pureed! Sickening!
Slash to the [target]'s ribs opens a sucking chest wound!
Quick
Effects: powerful slash! The [target]'s chest is ripped open!

Message: Hard slash to the [target]'s side opens its spleen!
Crossing slash to the chest catches the [target]'s attention!
Slashing blow to chest knocks the [target] back a few paces!
Slash to [target]'s chest. Breathe deep
Effects: it'll feel better in a minute.

Message: Slash to [target]'s chest. Breathe deep
Effects: it'll feel better in a minute.

Message: Deft slash across chest draws blood! The [target] takes a deep breath.
Weak slash across chest! Slightly less painful than heartburn.
Awful slash nearly decapitates the [target]! That's one way to lose your head.
Awful slash nearly decapitates the [target]! That's one way to lose your head.
Deep slash to the [target]'s neck severs an artery! The [target] chokes to death on its own blood.
Deep slash to the [target]'s neck severs an artery! The [target] chokes to death on its own blood.
Strong slash to throat nicks a few blood vessels.
Deft swing strikes the [target]'s neck. Maybe not fatal but it's sure distracting.
Strike dents the [target]'s larynx. Swallowing will be fun.
Masterful slash to the [target]'s lower back! Spinal cord and life are just memories now.
Slash to the [target]'s lower back! Kidneys sliced and diced! Death is slow and painful.
Deft slash! The [target] is spun around and hit hard in its lower back.
The [target] twists away but is caught with a hard slash! Back is broken!
Feint left spins the [target] around! Jagged slash to lower back.
Slash along the [target]'s lower back.
Feint to the left goes astray as the [target] dodges! You scratch my back...
Weak slash to the [target]'s lower back!
Glancing blow to the [target]'s back. That could have been better.
Slash to the [target]'s lower back! Pain shoots up along [target]'s spine.
Terrible slash to the [target]'s side! Entrails spill out
Effects: onto the ground! Death can be SO messy.

Message: Bloody slash to the [target]'s side! Instant death
Bloody slash to the [target]'s side! Instant death
Deep slash to the [target]'s right side! Several inches of padding sliced off hip.... From the inside!
The [target] is backed up by a strong slash to its abdomen!
Diagonal slash leaves a bloody trail across the [target]'s torso.
Hard slash to belly severs a few nerve endings.
Smooth slash to the [target]'s hip! Nice crunching sound.
Awkward slash to the [target]'s stomach! Everyone needs another belly button.
Light slash to the [target]'s abdomen! Barely nicked.
Awesome slash sever the [target]'s right arm! A jagged stump is all that remains!
Spectacular slash! The [target]'s right arm is neatly amputated!
Hard slash to the [target]'s side! Right arm no longer available for use.
Quick
Effects: hard slash to the [target]'s right arm! "CRACK"

Message: Deep slash to the [target]'s right forearm!
Powerful slash just cracks the [target]'s weapon arm!
Slash to the [target]'s right arm! Slices neatly through the skin and meets bone!
Hesitant slash to the [target]'s upper right arm! Just a scratch.
Quick slash to the [target]'s upper right arm! Just a nick.
Weak slash to the [target]'s right arm. That doesn't even sting.
Powerful slash leaves the [target] without a left leg!
Powerful slash! The [target]'s left leg is severed at the knee!
Wild downward slash severs the [target]'s left foot! Bloody stump
Weak diagonal slash catches the [target]'s left knee! It is dislocated.
Quick
Effects: powerful slash to the [target]'s left knee!

Message: Deft slash to the [target]'s left leg digs deep! Bone is chipped!
Downward slash across the [target]'s left thigh! Gouges bone!
Banged the [target]'s left shin. That'll raise a good welt.
Slash to the [target]'s left leg hits high! Kinda makes your knees weak
Light
Effects: bruising slash to the [target]'s left thigh.

Message: Off-balanced slash! Enough force to sever the [target]'s right hand! Amazing!
Powerful slash trims the [target]'s fingernails... and the remainder of its right hand!
Jagged slash to the [target]'s right arm! Cut clean through at the wrist. Need a hand?
Rapped the [target]'s knuckles hard! Right hand sounds broken.
Slash to the [target]'s weapon hand! Several fingers fly!
Strong slash to the [target]'s right hand cuts deep.
Feint to the [target]'s head! Quick flick at its weapon hand! Nasty cut to right hand!
Wild slash bounces off the back of the [target]'s hand.
Diagonal slash to the [target]'s weapon arm. Strike misses but bruises a few knuckles.
Near-miss! That'll hurt tomorrow.
Off-balanced slash! Enough force to sever the [target]'s left hand! Amazing!
Powerful slash trims the [target]'s fingernails... and the remainder of its left hand!
Jagged slash to the [target]'s left arm! Cut clean through at the wrist. Need a hand?
Rapped the knuckles hard! Left hand sounds broken.
Slash to the [target]'s shield hand! Several fingers fly!
Deep cut to the [target]'s left hand! Seems to have broken some fingers too.
Slice to the [target]'s left fingers. Nice move.
Wild slash scratches the back of the [target]'s hand.
Slash to the [target]'s shield arm. Strike trims off a few fingernails.
Near-miss! Knuckles kissed but little damage.
Quick feint to the [target]'s right foot! Little extra damage.
Slash to the [target]'s right leg hits high! Kinda makes your knees weak
Banged the [target]'s right shin. That'll raise a good welt.
Downward slash across the [target]'s right thigh! Might not scar.

Effects: bloody slash to the [target]'s right thigh!

Message: Quick
Effects: powerful slash to the [target]'s right knee!

Message: Strong slash to the [target]'s right leg! Muscles exposed! Not a pretty sight.
Wild downward slash severs the [target]'s right foot! Bloody stump
Powerful slash! The [target]'s right leg is severed at the knee!
Powerful slash leaves the [target] without a right leg!
Blast to the [target]'s head destroys right eye! Brain obliterated! Disgusting
Effects: but painful only for a second.

Message: Horrifying slash to the [target]'s head! Right eye sliced open! Brain pureed!
Slash to the [target]'s right eye! Vitreous fluid spews forth! Seeya!
Slash to head destroys the [target]'s right eye! Doesn't do its brain any good either.
Slash strikes the [target]'s right eye. Seems there was a brain there after all.
Upward slash gouges the [target]'s cheek! Right eye lost! Pity.
Grazing slash to the [target]'s face! Scratch to its eyelids. "When blood gets in your eyes..."
Gash to the [target]'s right eyebrow. That's going to be quite a shiner!
Slashing strike near forehead nicks an eyebrow! That must sting!
Quick slash at the [target]'s right eye. Strike lands but misses target.
Quick slash to the [target]'s left eye. Strike lands but misses target.
Slashing strike near forehead nicks an eyelid! That must sting!
Gash to the [target]'s left eyebrow. That's going to be quite a shiner!
Grazing slash to the [target]'s face! Scratches its left eye. Ouch!
Upward slash gouges the [target]'s cheek! Left eye lost! Pity.
Slash strikes the [target]'s left eye. Seems there was a brain there after all.
Slash to head destroys the [target]'s left eye! Doesn't do its brain any good either.
Slash to the [target]'s left eye! Vitreous fluid spews forth! Seeya!
